parent.body:
Don't believe it, post a picture holding a piece of paper with my username for evidence. 

However, your probable lies aside, i will give you some sympathy for the scenario of being bad at everything you like because that is my situation. I'm not good at anything but i have to pass the time somehow... but i can't tell anyone around me about my interests because i suck.  

Yes, i like to play video games, no, i'm not at world tournament levels.

yes, i like to write for my own amusement. No, i'm not writing new york times best sellers that will get a netflix series. 

yes, i like to play board games. No, i'm not a russian grandmaster at chess. 

people are so annoying, the internet ruined society. Now that we are blasted everyday with the most extreme of every activity; nobody is impressed except by the top 1% of the 1%.

body:
anecdotal evidence is not evidence. Do you have any studies, or prove-able statistic to back up your words? cause right now, your argument is basically. 

" well, 90% of the people in art school are women... so they must be the best at it "

your point about testosterone and competition aren't complete garbage... However, are you suggesting women have no competitive instinct? cause there aren't female Olympians i guess. Saying that we are all admiring turds because some guy shouted about it, while ignoring the works of women; is bullshit.  Women are even more vain then men, and take every opportunity to show their superiority to their inferiors. 

If they had the skills to best men in the arts, they would have done it. Men are just a more diverse group than women and have other pass times. Like getting big and muscular, more skilled with a sword or bow, being a better craftsman. That is why women flock to the arts, they only have like 5 different personalities within the whole gender.

parent.body: Go look into any place and most of the women are into drawing and writing and stuff while most of the men have already given up long ago. It's just that the few men who are good have a LOT more of a drive to compete and publicize their work than the women which is due to testosterone. They're also pressured to be breadwinners and make money more than women. This matches my experience, as the women are usually significantly more talented but also tend to keep their work to themselves and just do it for fun, while the men boast about it loudly and try to be better than each other. If you think about it this makes perfect sense from a biological perspective too. Men did the hunting and the fighting while the women did the softer tasks.

body:
LOL you're drunk. They support a gynocentric patriarchy. Where women are treated like children, but viewed as equals. 

Pay me the same as a man! but also don't hold me to the same physical standards.

ya! girls can do anything a man can do! but also don't put us in the same sport leagues, or we'll be crushed. 

Ya! my man should pay for everything and take care of me! but also treat me as a full and equal partner that he consults with to make financial decisions. 

They don't support the patriarchy, They support the social welfare state that's existed for all of humanity. Men just started feeling bad for hitting them, so they are now trying to be the men as well.

body: In my experience women are a lot more varied than men in personality. There are women encompassing pretty much every personality but the vast majority of men fit their gender stereotype very closely. Don't try to tell me there's even close to as many girly men as there is tomboys. This is most likely because our biology sees women as more valuable but not men, so the latter is considered a nuisance and expected to just shut up and do their work for society.

body: I'm not an incel, I browse /all/comments and this guild is like half of it. I threw that statement in there because it's stupid that some people get a bunch of good things we don't want and none of the ones we do, and it works both ways. I should not have had to explain that to you, I think you're just looking for something to argue with me about.

>What the hell is that going to prove?

well, above you said. 

>I'm also the kind that gets chased by girls everywhere and could get it easier than anyone I know. 

I am asking you to back up your words. Why would you even throw that statement in there when it didn't relate to the topic? Doesn't make sense. Not that i believe a guy who is browsing incel subs is having his door beat down by hot girls wanting sex, but he's just not into it.

So, men are seen as biological nuisances... but somehow were able to take over every industry and art?

already told you, anecdotal evidence is not evidence. I once seen a black guy and a white guy hanging out, therefore racism doesn't exist?

Women also fit their stereotypes... that is why they are stereotypes, because they are generally true.

body:
>I should not have had to explain that to you

That's true. One of the many traits of inceldom is telepathy, and i  always have understanding of the intention people have behind their words. 

Your statement was a little shoehorned in and didn't cleanly fit. This made me assume it was an attempt at random, senseless bragging. If it was just a comparison of wants vs the ability to satisfy them... that is fine.
